memberdef.argsstring: (Param &XParam, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< T > &XModel, Model< T > &XModel_g)
memberdef.name: MainLoop

briefdescription.para: Main simulation loop for the flood model.

detaileddescription.para: Advances the simulation in time, applying boundary conditions, forcing, core engine, output, and crash detection. Handles both CPU and GPU execution paths.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param &XParam, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< float > &XModel, Model< float > &XModel_g)
memberdef.name: MainLoop< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param &XParam, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< double > &XModel, Model< double > &XModel_g)
memberdef.name: MainLoop< double >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param &XParam, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< T > &XModel, Model< T > &XModel_g)
memberdef.name: DebugLoop

briefdescription.para: Debugging loop for the flood model.

detaileddescription.para: Used to debug and wrap the debug flow engine. Runs a fixed number of steps and outputs diagnostic information. Handles both CPU and GPU execution paths.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param &XParam, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< float > &XModel, Model< float > &XModel_g)
memberdef.name: DebugLoop< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param &XParam, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< double > &XModel, Model< double > &XModel_g)
memberdef.name: DebugLoop< double >

detaileddescription.para: Sets up loop control variables, output buffers, and initial time step.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Loop< T > XLoop, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< T > XModel, Model< T > XModel_g)
memberdef.name: updateBnd

briefdescription.para: Update boundary conditions for the simulation.

detaileddescription.para: Applies boundary flows for each segment, handling both CPU and GPU execution paths.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Loop< T > &XLoop, Model< T > &XModel, Model< T > XModel_g)
memberdef.name: mapoutput

briefdescription.para: Output map data at specified simulation times.

detaileddescription.para: Saves model state to NetCDF files when output times are reached, handling both CPU and GPU data transfer.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Loop< T > &XLoop, Model< T > XModel, Model< T > XModel_g)
memberdef.name: pointoutputstep

briefdescription.para: Output time series data for specified nodes.

detaileddescription.para: Collects and writes time series output for selected nodes, handling both CPU and GPU data paths and buffer management.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, int noutnodes, int outnode, int istep, int blknode, int inode, int jnode, int *blkTS, EvolvingP< T > XEv, T *store)
memberdef.name: storeTSout

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel to store time series output for specified nodes.

detaileddescription.para: Writes evolving variables for selected nodes and time steps to output storage array.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Loop< T > XLoop, Model< T > XModel)
memberdef.name: initdt

detaileddescription.para: Calculates the initial time step based on user input or model parameters. Uses either a user-specified value or computes a safe initial value based on water depth and cell resolution.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Loop< float > XLoop, Model< float > XModel)
memberdef.name: initdt< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Loop< double > XLoop, Model< double > XModel)
memberdef.name: initdt< double >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > XEvolv, T *dtmax)
memberdef.name: CalcInitdtCPU

briefdescription.para: Calculate initial time step values on the CPU for all blocks and nodes.

detaileddescription.para: Computes the maximum allowable time step for each cell based on local water depth and cell resolution.

parameterdescription.para: Output array for maximum time step per cell

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > XEvolv, T *dtmax)
memberdef.name: CalcInitdtGPU

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel to calculate initial time step values on the GPU for all blocks and nodes.

detaileddescription.para: Computes the maximum allowable time step for each cell using GPU parallelism.

parameterdescription.para: Output array for maximum time step per cell

briefdescription.para: Print the current simulation time and time step to the console.

detaileddescription.para: Displays the total simulation time and current time step in a formatted manner.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param &XParam, Loop< T > XLoop, Model< T > XModel, Model< T > XModel_g)
memberdef.name: CrashDetection

briefdescription.para: Detects simulation crash due to small time steps and generates a crash report.

detaileddescription.para: If the time step falls below the minimum allowed value before the simulation end time, stops the model and writes output variables to a crash report file. Handles both CPU and GPU data transfer for output variables.
